App Name: Volume Booster

Brief:

Volume Booster, known as EZ Booster, is designed to amplify sound on your phone, transforming it into a portable speaker at your fingertips. Ideal for those keen on enhancing their audio experience, this app caters to a vast spectrum of audio needsâ€”be it music, movies or alarms.

Volume Booster is a free application, ensuring wider accessibility for users looking to enhance their device's sound quality without an upfront payment.

Volume Booster unveils a concert-like audio experience right from your mobile deviceâ€”whether it's for amplifying your favorite tunes or ensuring you never miss an alarm. However, enjoy responsibly to prevent any long-term damage to your hearing or device. Download EZ Booster now and elevate your audio to unprecedented levels!
